name: No Time To Live
description:
How often we forget about our dreams? How often we forget about the most important things for us? How much we are ready to pay for our dream?

This is a story about an office clerk who tries to leave monotonous routine of life and do a book. And if he could find the time for his dream it depends on you.

Details or special characteristics of the game:

* 4 endings

* great variety in a small world
